item.title: What I've Learned in Computational Biostatistics
item.description: Hey There! I've learned so much in my SDS348 course this year and wanted to share some of the things we worked on. R and Python Can Talk to Each Other... You can use reticulate to use Python within an R session and to share information across code chunks. Don't believe me? Check this out! This is an R code chunk. We're using an R code chunk, in an R session.
